org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel

Interface FormulaEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseFormulaEvaluator, BaseXSSFFormulaEvaluator, HSSFFormulaEvaluator, SXSSFFormulaEvaluator, XSSFFormulaEvaluator 

    public interface FormulaEvaluator
    Evaluates formula cells.

    For performance reasons, this class keeps a cache of all previously calculated intermediate cell values. Be sure to call clearAllCachedResultValues() if any workbook cells are changed between calls to evaluate~ methods on this class.

    (评估公式单元格。出于性能原因，此类保留了之前计算出的所有中间像元值的缓存。如果在调用此类上的~方法之间更改了任何工作簿单元格，请务必调用clearAllCachedResultValues（）。)
    Author:
    Amol S. Deshmukh < amolweb at ya hoo dot com >, Josh Micich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllCachedResultValues()
      Should be called whenever there are changes to input cells in the evaluated workbook.(每当评估工作簿中的输入单元格发生更改时，都应调用。)
      CellValue evaluate(Cell cell)
      If cell contains a formula, the formula is evaluated and returned, else the CellValue simply copies the appropriate cell value from the cell and also its cell type.(如果单元格包含公式，则计算并返回公式，否则CellValue只是从单元格及其单元格类型复制适当的单元格值。)
      void evaluateAll()
      Loops over all cells in all sheets of the associated workbook.(在关联工作簿的所有工作表中的所有单元格上循环。)
      CellType evaluateFormulaCell(Cell cell)
      If cell contains formula, it evaluates the formula, and saves the result of the formula.(如果单元格包含公式，则会评估公式并保存公式的结果。)
      Cell evaluateInCell(Cell cell)
      If cell contains formula, it evaluates the formula, and puts the formula result back into the cell, in place of the old formula.(如果单元格包含公式，它会评估公式，并将公式结果放回单元格中，代替旧公式。)
      void notifyDeleteCell(Cell cell)
      Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified cell has just become a formula cell, or the formula text has changed(应调用以告知单元格值缓存指定的单元格刚刚成为公式单元格，或者公式文本已更改)
      void notifySetFormula(Cell cell)
      Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified (value or formula) cell has changed.(应调用以告诉单元格值缓存指定的（值或公式）单元格已更改。)
      void notifyUpdateCell(Cell cell)
      Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified (value or formula) cell has changed.(应调用以告诉单元格值缓存指定的（值或公式）单元格已更改。)
      void setDebugEvaluationOutputForNextEval(boolean value)
      Perform detailed output of formula evaluation for next evaluation only? Is for developer use only (also developers using POI for their XLS files).(仅为下次评估执行公式评估的详细输出？仅供开发人员使用（也可使用其XLS文件的开发人员）。)
      void setIgnoreMissingWorkbooks(boolean ignore)
      Whether to ignore missing references to external workbooks and use cached formula results in the main workbook instead.(是否忽略缺少的对外部工作簿的引用，而改用主工作簿中的缓存公式结果。)
      void setupReferencedWorkbooks(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FormulaEvaluator> workbooks)
      Sets up the Formula Evaluator to be able to reference and resolve links to other workbooks, eg [Test.xls]Sheet1!A1.(设置公式评估器，以便能够引用和解析到其他工作簿的链接，例如[Test.xls] Sheet 1！A1.)

    • Method Detail

      • clearAllCachedResultValues

        void clearAllCachedResultValues()
        Should be called whenever there are changes to input cells in the evaluated workbook. Failure to call this method after changing cell values will cause incorrect behaviour of the evaluate~ methods of this class(每当评估工作簿中的输入单元格发生更改时，都应调用。更改单元格值后未能调用此方法将导致此类的evalent ~方法的行为不正确)

      • notifySetFormula

        void notifySetFormula(Cell cell)
        Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified (value or formula) cell has changed. Failure to call this method after changing cell values will cause incorrect behaviour of the evaluate~ methods of this class(应调用以告诉单元格值缓存指定的（值或公式）单元格已更改。更改单元格值后未能调用此方法将导致此类的evalent ~方法的行为不正确)

      • notifyDeleteCell

        void notifyDeleteCell(Cell cell)
        Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified cell has just become a formula cell, or the formula text has changed(应调用以告知单元格值缓存指定的单元格刚刚成为公式单元格，或者公式文本已更改)

      • notifyUpdateCell

        void notifyUpdateCell(Cell cell)
        Should be called to tell the cell value cache that the specified (value or formula) cell has changed. Failure to call this method after changing cell values will cause incorrect behaviour of the evaluate~ methods of this class(应调用以告诉单元格值缓存指定的（值或公式）单元格已更改。更改单元格值后未能调用此方法将导致此类的evalent ~方法的行为不正确)

      • evaluateAll

        void evaluateAll()
        Loops over all cells in all sheets of the associated workbook. For cells that contain formulas, their formulas are evaluated, and the results are saved. These cells remain as formula cells. For cells that do not contain formulas, no changes are made. This is a helpful wrapper around looping over all cells, and calling evaluateFormulaCell on each one.(在关联工作簿的所有工作表中的所有单元格上循环。对于包含公式的单元格，将评估其公式并保存结果。这些细胞仍然作为公式细胞。对于不包含公式的单元格，不会进行任何更改。这是一个有用的包装器，可以循环所有单元格并对每个单元格调用evailateFormulaCell。)

      • evaluate

        CellValue evaluate(Cell cell)
        If cell contains a formula, the formula is evaluated and returned, else the CellValue simply copies the appropriate cell value from the cell and also its cell type. This method should be preferred over evaluateInCell() when the call should not modify the contents of the original cell.(如果单元格包含公式，则计算并返回公式，否则CellValue只是从单元格及其单元格类型复制适当的单元格值。当调用不应修改原始单元格的内容时，此方法应优先于evalveinCell（）。)
        Parameters:
        cell - The Cell to evaluate(cell -要评估的细胞)

      • evaluateFormulaCell

        CellType evaluateFormulaCell(Cell cell)
        If cell contains formula, it evaluates the formula, and saves the result of the formula. The cell remains as a formula cell. Else if cell does not contain formula, this method leaves the cell unchanged. Note that the type of the formula result is returned, so you know what kind of value is also stored with the formula. 
         int evaluatedCellType = evaluator.evaluateFormulaCell(cell);
        Be aware that your cell will hold both the formula, and the result. If you want the cell replaced with the result of the formula, use evaluateInCell(Cell)        (如果单元格包含公式，则会评估公式并保存公式的结果。该单元格仍为公式单元格。否则，如果单元格不包含公式，此方法将保持单元格不变。请注意，返回的是公式结果的类型，因此您知道公式中还存储了什么类型的值。 int evalentCellType = evalent. evalent. evalentFormulaCell（cell）; 请注意，您的单元格将同时保存公式和结果。如果您希望用公式的结果替换单元格，请使用evalveInCell（Cell）)
        Parameters:
        cell - The cell to evaluate(cell -要计算的单元格)
        Returns:
        The type of the formula result, i.e. -1 if the cell is not a formula, or one of CellType.NUMERIC, CellType.STRING, CellType.BOOLEAN, CellType.ERROR Note: the cell's type remains as CellType.FORMULA however.(公式结果的类型，如果单元格不是公式，则为-1，或者CellType. NUERIC、CellType. WRING、CellType. BOALEAN、CellType. WRIGHT之一注意：单元格的类型仍为CellType.FORMULA。)

      • evaluateInCell

        Cell evaluateInCell(Cell cell)
        If cell contains formula, it evaluates the formula, and puts the formula result back into the cell, in place of the old formula. Else if cell does not contain formula, this method leaves the cell unchanged. Note that the same instance of Cell is returned to allow chained calls like: 
         int evaluatedCellType = evaluator.evaluateInCell(cell).getCellType();
        Be aware that your cell value will be changed to hold the result of the formula. If you simply want the formula value computed for you, use evaluateFormulaCell(Cell)        (如果单元格包含公式，它会评估公式，并将公式结果放回单元格中，代替旧公式。否则，如果单元格不包含公式，此方法将保持单元格不变。请注意，返回相同的Cell实例以允许链接调用，例如：int evaluatedCellType = everuerate.evaluateInCell（cell）.getCellType（）; 请注意，您的单元格值将更改以保存公式的结果。如果您只是想为您计算公式值，请使用evalateFormulaCell（Cell）)
        Parameters:
        cell - The Cell to evaluate and modify.(cell -要评估和修改的细胞。)

      • setupReferencedWorkbooks

        void setupReferencedWorkbooks(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FormulaEvaluator> workbooks)
        Sets up the Formula Evaluator to be able to reference and resolve links to other workbooks, eg [Test.xls]Sheet1!A1.

        For a workbook referenced as [Test.xls]Sheet1!A1, you should supply a map containing the key Test.xls (no square brackets), and an open FormulaEvaluator onto that Workbook.

        (设置公式评估器，以便能够引用和解析到其他工作簿的链接，例如[Test.xls] Sheet 1！A1.对于引用为[Test.xls] Sheet 1的工作簿！A1，您应该在该工作簿上提供一个包含键Test.xls（无方括号）的地图和一个打开的FormulaEvolator。)
        Parameters:
        workbooks - Map of workbook names (no square brackets) to an evaluator on that workbook(工作簿-工作簿名称（无方括号）到该工作簿上的评估者的映射)

      • setIgnoreMissingWorkbooks

        void setIgnoreMissingWorkbooks(boolean ignore)
        Whether to ignore missing references to external workbooks and use cached formula results in the main workbook instead.

        In some cases external workbooks referenced by formulas in the main workbook are not available. With this method you can control how POI handles such missing references:

        • by default ignoreMissingWorkbooks=false and POI throws CollaboratingWorkbooksEnvironment.WorkbookNotFoundException if an external reference cannot be resolved
        • if ignoreMissingWorkbooks=true then POI uses cached formula result that already exists in the main workbook
        (是否忽略缺少的对外部工作簿的引用，而改用主工作簿中的缓存公式结果。在某些情况下，主工作簿中的公式引用的外部工作簿不可用。使用此方法，您可以控制兴趣点如何处理此类缺失的引用：默认情况下，SEARCH reMissingWorkbooks = true，并且兴趣点会引发PartneratingWorkbooksEnvironment. WorkbookNotFoundExcellent如果SEARCH reMissingWorkbooks =true，那么兴趣点会使用主工作簿中已经存在的缓存公式结果)
        Parameters:
        ignore - whether to ignore missing references to external workbooks(忽略-是否忽略对外部工作簿的缺失引用)

      • setDebugEvaluationOutputForNextEval

        void setDebugEvaluationOutputForNextEval(boolean value)
        Perform detailed output of formula evaluation for next evaluation only? Is for developer use only (also developers using POI for their XLS files). Log-Level WARN is for basic info, INFO for detailed information. These quite high levels are used because you have to explicitly enable this specific logging.(仅为下次评估执行公式评估的详细输出？仅供开发人员使用（也可使用其XLS文件的开发人员）。Log-Level WARN代表基本信息，Info代表详细信息。使用这些相当高的级别是因为您必须显式启用此特定的日志记录。)
        Parameters:
        value - whether to perform detailed output(值-是否执行详细输出)
